casebody.data:
UNITED STATES of America, Plaintiff-Ap-pellee, v. Irving HALPER, Defendant-Appellant. No. 261. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. March 18, 1940. J. Arthur Adler and I. Maurice Worm-ser, both of New York City, for appellant. Harold M. Kennedy, U. S. Atty., of Brooklyn, N. Y. (Vine H. Smith, Asst. U. S. Atty., of Brooklyn, N. Y., of counsel), for appellee.

Before SWAN, CLARK, and PATTERSON, Circuit Judges. °

PER CURIAM.

Judgment affirmed.
